replies.bodyText:
The purpose of this method testConfigClusterStartServerUsingAlways
Make sure when the serverStartPolicy is set to ALWAYS, it overrides the replica count. It means Operator always start the server.  On the other hand,  IF_NEEDED serverStartPolicy is constrained by replica count.
So in this usecases, we need not use the start/stop server script.
